task.title: Enable running and debugging your project
task.shortdesc: To enable running and debugging the project directly from the web server you need to change the output folder for each module in IntelliJ to output to your web server's webroot.

step.cmd: Create a directory in your web server's webroot called pmp-desktop.
In IntelliJ, select FileProject Structure from the top menu.
Expand the build configurations for each module.
Edit the Output folder to point to your web server's webroot pmp-desktop directory.
step.info:
Make sure to append the current module's name to the end of the path. For example, /path/to/webserver/root/pmp-desktop/ReferencePlayer.
You need to have write permission to the output folder or your project will not build.

step.cmd: Repeat steps 5. through 7. for the remaining modules.
Click OK at the bottom of the window to accept the changes.
From the top menu, select BuildRebuild Project.
